settings.section_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us recognize your preferences, enhance site performance, and provide a better user experience.
We use cookies for various purposes, including:

settings.list_items: Essential Cookies: Necessary for website functionality (e.g., login, shopping cart)|Performance Cookies: Help us understand website traffic and improve usability|Functional Cookies: Remember your settings and preferences|Marketing Cookies: Personalize ads and track user behavior for targeted marketing

settings.section_content: You can control cookie settings through your browser:

settings.list_items: Adjust cookie settings in your browser preferences|Delete stored cookies manually|Opt-out of targeted advertising through third-party services
settings.list_description: For detailed instructions, visit All About Cookies.

settings.section_content: We may use third-party cookies from services like Google Analytics and advertising partners to track performance and personalize content. These third parties have their own cookie policies.
We may update this Cookie Policy to reflect changes in legal requirements or our data practices. Please review this page periodically for updates.

settings.heading: Cookie Policy
settings.introduction: At IberTechSystems, we use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze website traffic, and personalize content. This Cookie Policy explains how and why we use cookies on our website.
settings.footer_text: For more details, read our Privacy Policy.
